IXD Showcase 2019

We love a
good challenge.

As the third graduating class of Interaction Design at Sheridan, we’ve adapted to a rapidly evolving industry. We trust that our design process will help us overcome every obstacle we face.

We craft solutions grounded in research and compassion for even the most wicked problems—because what is design without its users people?
